Navigate to '/products'

Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, has text 'Add to Cart', font size 16px, font family 'Arial', font weight 600, background color #007bff, color #ffffff, padding 10px 15px, border radius 4px, width 150px, and height 40px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button hover background color transitions to #0056b3 over 200ms, and its border changes from 1px solid #007bff to 1px solid #0056b3
Verify the search input field's placeholder text is 'Search products...', width 300px, height 40px, border 1px solid #ccc, font size 14px, left margin 20px, and right margin 20px
Type 'Laptop' into the search input field
Verify the search input field's value becomes 'Laptop', it is focused, shows a 2px solid #007bff border, and y position remains constant
Load the product detail page

Confirm the main product image's source is 'product_main.jpg', alt text is 'Premium Laptop Model X', rendered dimensions are 800x600px, natural dimensions are 1600x1200px, loads within 500ms, is visible with opacity 1, has no watermark, has a 1px solid #eee border, is center aligned, and has padding 0
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link has text color #333333, font size 15px, font family 'Open Sans', font weight 400, bottom margin 10px, text align left, and background color transparent
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link active state text color changes to #0056b3, and a 2px solid #0056b3 border appears on its bottom edge over 150ms
Verify the video player element is visible, width 1280px, height 720px, and has a 1px solid #000 border
Verify the 'Mute' button's aria-label is 'Mute audio' and its background color is #f0f0f0
Click 'Mute'
Confirm audio is muted and the 'Mute' button's background color changes to #e0e0e0
Click 'Fullscreen'
Verify the video enters fullscreen mode, its top and left positions become 0px, and its background color is #000000
Open the 'Language' dropdown
Verify the count of options is 5 and the default selected value is 'English'
Verify the dropdown button has text color #333333, font size 14px, border 1px solid #ccc, and width 150px
Select 'Spanish'
Confirm the input field's value updates to 'Spanish' and its text color is #000000
Verify the dropdown list becomes hidden
Verify the order table has 5 rows

Confirm the 'Order ID' column's text align is left, 'Status' column's text align is center, all cell text has font size 14px and font family 'Roboto', the table's border is 1px solid #eee, padding 8px inside cells, and its overall width is 90% of the viewport
Click 'Open Modal'
Verify the modal is visible, centered on the screen, has background color #ffffff, border radius 8px, width 500px, height 300px, top margin 100px from the viewport top, and no border
Verify the overlay background color is rgba(0,0,0,0.5) with opacity 0.5
Scroll down the 'Articles' page by 500px

Verify the header element remains visible at top position 0px, has background color #f8f9fa, vertical padding 15px, height 60px, left and right positions remain 0px, border-bottom is 1px solid #e0e0e0, and its content alignment is center
Click the 'Submit Application' button
Verify the button becomes disabled, opacity changes to 0.7, background color changes to #6c757d with text color #ffffff, border is 0px, and width is 200px
Verify the submission animation starts and completes within 2 seconds
Click the 'Receive Newsletter' checkbox
Verify the checkbox becomes selected, has a 2px solid #007bff border when selected, its background color becomes #e6f7ff, and its shape is square
Verify its associated label 'Receive Newsletter' has text color #333333, font size 14px, and its value is true
Drag the right slider handle from 100 to 200
Verify the displayed value updates from '100' to '200' and the handle's x position shifts by 100px
Verify the slider track's background color indicates the selected range with #007bff and its height is 8px
Verify the text above the slider has font weight 600, color #333333, and font size 16px
Verify the handle itself has a border radius of 50%
Click the date input field
Verify the date picker calendar is visible, positioned directly below the input field with a top margin of 5px, its background color is #ffffff, and has a 1px solid #ccc border
Confirm the input field's value becomes '2023-10-26' and its text color is #000000
Verify the calendar then becomes hidden, transitioning in 300ms
Verify the 'Description' text area font size is 14px, padding 10px, border 1px solid #ccc, placeholder text is 'Enter description...', initial height is 100px, and initial scroll-top is 0
Type 500 characters into the 'Description' text area
Verify its height dynamically expands from 100px to 200px
Verify after typing beyond its visible height, scroll-top adjusts to show the latest input

Verify the 'User Profile' icon has color #6c757d, width 24px, height 24px, aria-label is 'User profile settings', shape is circular with border radius 50%, is visible, has a top margin of 5px, and its background color is transparent

Verify a tooltip becomes visible after 300ms, has text content 'Click for assistance', background color #333333, color #ffffff, padding 8px, is positioned 10px below the 'Help' icon (y offset), opacity is 1, border radius is 3px, and font size is 12px
